      • testStepping

        public void testStepping()
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Tests whether the step looper causes the game to step correctly. Starts the Step Looper then waits for 5000 milliseconds, then checks the plant to see whether 10 steps have occurred.

        java.lang.InterruptedException
